title: FS-15 card prewar minor league lot
author: drdduet

posts.post_title: FS-15 card prewar minor league lot
posts.post_content:
Included in this lot is 15 presentable  prewar tobacco cards of period minor leaguers.  The lot includes 8 obaks, 5 T210's, and 2 Imperial tobacco.  Price on lot is $200.

Please send inquiries or scan requests to [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url].
